title: Create a Segmented Audience
description: A marketer wants to create a special promotion for 'high-value' customers.

tasks.description: Open the customer segmentation tool in the marketing platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The marketer accesses the audience builder.

tasks.description: Create a new segment with the rules: (Is a loyalty member) AND (Total spend in last 12 months > $1000).
tasks.expected_outcome: The marketer defines the criteria for the high-value segment.

tasks.description: Save the segment. The system generates a list of all customers who meet the criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new target audience is created and can be used for future marketing campaigns.
